name: Storefront Furnishing: Super Special Prices
description: This display goes at the front of the shop, and the details of the charity sale are pasted upon it, along with the cause to which the proceeds will go. Other than the aforementioned information, there is another important thing here that has to be conveyed to potential customers â€” items that are on sale!\n"After much discussion with Paimon, we came to an important decision."\n"To fire everyone up to support this charity sale, the snacks on offer at Favonian Goodies will be cheaper than that of normal stalls all across the board, so in a manner of speaking, everything here is on sale!"
